name: Custom Vehicle
description: New vehicle variant with custom behavior or properties
instructions:
CRITICAL: Use api_search to verify EVERY method you call. Never guess Enfusion API method names — they are non-standard and many obvious-sounding methods don't exist.
1. Use api_search to look up VehicleControllerComponent, CarControllerComponent, and any vehicle-related classes — verify methods exist before using them
2. Find a base vehicle prefab to inherit from (e.g., M151A2, UAZ469)
3. Create your vehicle prefab inheriting from the base — vehicles MUST inherit from a base game vehicle prefab or they won't have physics/driving setup
4. Modify vehicle properties (speed, armor, fuel capacity) in the prefab
5. Add the custom VehicleController component for special behavior — only call methods confirmed by api_search
6. Place the vehicle in a world or use Game Master to spawn it
7. Test driving, collision, and vehicle entry/exit
